body.p: Pivotal Software provides a full range of commercial support and services for RabbitMQ.
Pivotal Software offers commercial support agreements for the most recent open source release of RabbitMQ.
Pivotal Software also produces a commercially licensed release of RabbitMQ. This includes all of the features of the open source version and provides extended support.

The following companies provide free, virtual, or instructor-led courses for RabbitMQ: Pivotal Software, LearnQuest and Open Source Architect. These training courses cover learning messaging with RabbitMQ, use cases, patterns, best practice design and architecture.

Erlang Solutions, XPlatform Consulting, NobleProg and others provide professional consulting services to address specific issues such as on-site troubleshooting, design review, deployment planning, project delivery and other value-adding services tailored to suit your needs.
Please contact us for more information.
